TopicTitle: We need another one of these. Outer Wilds thread!!

Articles.Content: For those unfamiliar with the game, here is their site: http://outerwilds.com/. It's a space exploration game based around the mechanic that the solar system's sun is exploding in 20 minutes. When it does, the game resets. However, this is to the player's advantage, as many of the planets change over the 20 minute period, so this way you can see everything. The physics aren't very realistic, but it's a fun game regardless, and definitely one worth checking out (especially since it's free)! I'll be posting some of my screencaps soon, but feel free to talk about the game or ask questions!

That sounds like a Ray Bradbury type of story.

Edit: Just downloaded it, this is blowing my mind.

Edited June 8, 2014 by ZedNova

I know about it,could sit with the explorers and just sit around,soaking up the atmosphere.

It really captures that "explorer" type of feeling.

But alas I managed to break it and now the sun wont go nova even after 50 minutes
